channel.title: Paul and Andrea Fries on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Paul and Andrea Fries on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2013-{year} David E. Williams. All rights reserved.

item.title: Status Update – March 22, 2020
item.description: Church was live-streamed although we didn’t watch. Instead we did our own church, sang songs, and Lesa had a lesson for us. It worked out pretty good. Made it to Lowe’s and got the right faucet. I went to Aldi’s looking for TP, milk, pizza rolls, chicken tenders, and mashed potatoes – had nada. Went to Walmart and they had everything but the mashed potatoes. Got home and fixed the faucet.

item.title: Status Update – December 20, 2019
item.description: School, daycare, work. Lesa had a long rough day of moving and network being out – per usual. I had an okay workday but couldn’t wait to get out of there. Kids had a fun day of partying at school, Polar Express day where they wore their pajamas and watched the movie, a scavenger hunt, and other festivities to kick off Christmas Break. I left work at 3:30pm and went to get kids, picked up a card Daniel sent to our PO Box, picked up Papa John’s pizza, and filled my tank.

item.title: Status Update – November 10, 2019
item.description: Church, Deacon in Back and Lobby Security. Afterward, we hooked up trailer and loaded bikes, got gas, and went to Paul and Andrea’s for lunch with the Johnsons. Beautiful day for cookout. Kids rode bikes and had an awesome time and didn’t want to leave. Got home and kids still rambunctious and played outside. Kaleena came over and ate with us. I got into a fight with Lesa and left for a couple of hours, had to decide whether I wanted to come back or not, came back for the kids’ sake.

item.title: Status Update – October 27, 2019
item.description: Church, paid for Dillan and Ashley to go to SuperStart. Lesa got mad at Dillan and me for horsing in the pews during the sermon. Ross and Bobbi Johnson’s last day, most likely won’t see them again. They gave kids some Matchbox toy cars. We took them and the Fries out to lunch at El Ranchero Mexican Restaurant in Bloomington, we all had a nice time – even the kids. Always hard to lose good friends and decent people.

item.title: Status Update – September 21, 2019
item.description: Scheduling hell, Lesa had girls day out with Andrea and Bobbie. I was supposed to go fishing and rent boat with Paul and Ross and kids. Ashley had a GS Horseback Riding event. Lesa canceled fishing for me after scheduling fishing for me. Anyway, Ashley woke up with allergic reaction on her face, called doctor, suggested Benadryl, didn’t help like we knew it wouldn’t. Got a plate for the 4Runner, chicken and rabbit feed, and took the kids to lunch at Steak ‘n’ Shake.

item.title: Status Update – August 11, 2019
item.description: Church. I baptized Ashley and Dillan! Praise God! How awesome is that‽ We took Kathy Mitchell and Paul and Andrea Fries to El Ranchero for lunch, we all had a great time! Fantastic Sams for kid haircuts. Bought Lesa bedroom suite/mattress at Living Room Center. Truck overheating.
